Deprecated API

Contents
  • Deprecated Interfaces
  • Deprecated Classes
Deprecated Interfaces
org.easymock.ArgumentsMatcher
          Since EasyMock 2.0, ArgumentsMatchers are only supported for the legacy MockControl. For mock objects generated by the methods on EasyMock, there are per-argument matchers available. For more information, see the EasyMock documentation. 
 

Deprecated Classes
org.easymock.AbstractMatcher
          Since EasyMock 2.0, ArgumentsMatchers are only supported for the legacy MockControl. For mock objects generated by the methods on EasyMock, there are per-argument matchers available. For more information, see the EasyMock documentation. 
org.easymock.MockControl
          Since EasyMock 2.0, static methods on EasyMock are used to create and control mock objects.
